summary: The University of Alabama, often called "Bama" or "The Capstone," is a public research university in Tuscaloosa, Alabama. Founded in 1820, it's the oldest and largest public university in the state. UA offers many advanced degrees and has the only public law school in Alabama. It's known for its strong research and unique programs. The university played important roles in the Civil War and Civil Rights Movement. Its football team, the Crimson Tide, is one of the best in US history. UA has produced many talented scholars, including Goldwater, Rhodes, and Truman Scholars.
title: University of Alabama
